cmp: 句 ((a measure word, for sentences or lines of verse)/sentence)
mng: to hook, to sew, to crochet, hook, check mark or tick, window catch

exm.mng: hook (on which to hang sth), to couple, to link together, to establish contact with, hook, coupling links (e.g. between two railway coaches)
to cut ties, to disconnect, out of touch
to tick, to check, tick mark, check mark
barb, bicycle kick, or overhead kick (football)
to hook onto, to hitch onto, to catch onto
